sentences.en: Contrary to popular belief, moderate exercise actually decreases your appetite.
sentences.cn: 与通常的看法相反，适度的运动事实上会降低食欲。

sentences.en: Don't spoil your appetite by eating sweets just before dinner.
sentences.cn: 不要在饭前吃糖来损害你的食欲.

sentences.en: He has a gigantic appetite and eats gigantic meals.
sentences.cn: 他有很大的食量,能吃很多的食物.

sentences.en: He suffered from headaches and loss of appetite .
sentences.cn: 他患有头痛和食欲不振。

sentences.en: Her husband always had a huge appetite.
His fever is allayed, but his appetite is still flatted.
sentences.cn: 他发烧减轻了, 但食欲仍然不振.

sentences.en: I began to curb my appetite for food and drink.
I have no appetite because I didn't sleep well last night.
I love reading: I have an insatiable appetite for vicarious experience.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢读书,对于体验间接经历有一种不能满足的渴求.

sentences.en: Lili had clearly regained her appetite but Doran was disinterested in food.
sentences.cn: 莉莉显然已经恢复了食欲，但多兰却提不起胃口。

sentences.en: She feels pretty well, but she hasn't much of an appetite.
sentences.cn: 她精神还不错, 不过胃口不太好.

sentences.en: She has an amazing appetite for knowledge.
Symptoms are a slight fever, headache and loss of appetite.
sentences.cn: 症状包括低烧、头痛和食欲不振。

sentences.en: Symptoms include tiredness and loss of appetite.
sentences.cn: 症状包括疲倦和食欲不振。

sentences.en: The book will whet your appetite for more of her work.
sentences.cn: 你看了这本书就会更想多读她的著作。

sentences.en: The public has an insatiable appetite for stories about the famous.
sentences.cn: 公众对名人有着难以满足的好奇心。

words.tran_cn: 促进食欲的；美味可口的；开胃的，诱人的
食欲的；有食欲的；开胃的
